name: mini-io-game
description: A minimal real-time .io style multiplayer game (original code, inspired by cell-eating mechanics)

scripts.open: powershell -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command "$used=(Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue); if(-not $used){ Start-Process node -ArgumentList 'server/server.js' }; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 400; Start-Process http://localhost:3000"
